meanings.definition: Cloth coverings hanging in loose folds.
meanings.sent1: The draperies in the living room are a beautiful shade of blue.
meanings.sent2: She opened the draperies to let the sunlight in.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat loves to hide behind the draperies and surprise us.
meanings.sent4: As the wind blew, the draperies danced gracefully in the air.
meanings.sent5: The elegant draperies added a touch of sophistication to the room.

meanings.definition: A shop selling cloth and sewing materials.
meanings.sent1: We visited the local draperies to buy some fabric for our project.
meanings.sent2: The draperies on Main Street has a wide selection of textiles.
meanings.sent3: I never leave the draperies without buying some colorful threads.
meanings.sent4: The draperies owner always greets customers with a warm smile.
meanings.sent5: The draperies is a haven for anyone passionate about sewing.
